author: newsr.in
title: Khloe Kardashian Breaks Her Silence on Lamar Odom's Hospitalization
text: Khloe Kardashian has finally released a statement after her ex Lamar Odom‘s hospitalization over the last several days. “The past week has been incredibly difficult. I am so thankful to family, friends and fans, who have sent nothing but prayers and well wishes to Lamar,” the 31-year-old reality star wrote on her website. Khloe had [...] »
